title: Pak envoy to U.S. wishes ‘spiritually blessed Ramazan’ to Muslims world over
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 24 (APP):Pakistan’s Ambassador to the United States Asad Muhammad Khan on Friday wished a “spiritually blessed Ramazan” to Muslims in the U.S. and in the world over.
“May this be a month of peace, blessing and forgiveness,” the ambassador wrote on Twitter.
Ambassador Asad Khan also prayed for those who lost lives to COVID-19 and for the quick recovery of those fighting this epidemic.
